name: UTI Nifty 50 Index Fund
description: Passive fund tracking Nifty 50 index with minimal tracking error
investmentPhilosophy: Passive replication of Nifty 50 constituents with quarterly rebalancing
pros: Lowest expense ratio in category at 0.12%
Perfect tracking of Nifty 50 with minimal error
Highly liquid with strong AUM base
Ideal for long-term wealth creation
Tax-efficient for equity taxation benefits
cons: No potential to outperform benchmark
No active risk management during market downturns
Concentrated in large caps only
Subject to full market volatility

name: Motilal Oswal Midcap Fund
description: High conviction mid cap fund with concentrated portfolio approach
investmentPhilosophy: Focused portfolio of 25-30 high-quality mid-caps with strong competitive advantages
pros: Exceptional 5-year CAGR of 22.5%
Concentrated portfolio of best ideas
Strong research-driven stock selection
Proven track record across market cycles
Low expense ratio for active mid-cap fund
cons: Higher volatility due to mid-cap exposure
Concentrated portfolio increases risk
Not suitable for risk-averse investors
Exit load of 1% if redeemed within 1 year

name: Quant Small Cap Fund
description: Aggressive small cap fund with multi-cap flexibility for high growth
investmentPhilosophy: Bottom-up stock picking in emerging businesses with strong unit economics
pros: Outstanding 3-year CAGR of 35%
Flexibility to invest across market caps
Experienced fund manager with proven track record
Access to hidden gems in small-cap space
Strong risk-adjusted returns
cons: Very high volatility - not for beginners
Limited liquidity in portfolio stocks
Higher downside risk in bear markets
Requires 5+ year investment horizon

name: HDFC Flexi Cap Fund
description: Flexible allocation fund investing across market capitalizations
investmentPhilosophy: Contrarian value investing with long-term horizon across market caps
pros: One of India's oldest and largest equity funds
Flexibility to shift between large, mid, small caps
Consistent long-term wealth creator (20+ years)
Strong downside protection in bear markets
Suitable for core portfolio holding
cons: Recent underperformance post fund manager change
Contrarian approach may lag in momentum markets
Large AUM may impact agility
Higher expense ratio for passive investors
